tool_description: Easy-to-integrate AI-Powered Image Caption Generation API that supports multiple languages and vibes. Get started in 10 seconds or less! Perfect for social media, blog posts, advertising campaigns, and more!
name: Image Caption Generator
title: Image Caption Generator

api_list.name: Generate image tags
api_list.description: Tags the image with a list of words related to the image content. Tags are ranked by their confidence scores.

api_list.name: Generates a concise caption from image url
api_list.description: Generates a plain, concise caption of the provided image using the BLIP model.

required_parameters.name: imageUrl
required_parameters.description: If true, hashtags will be added to generate captions.

api_list.name: Generates  engaging captions from image url
api_list.description:
Generates creative and engaging captions for an image. Highly customizable:

- `useEmojis`: If true emojis will be used in captions.
- `useHashtags`: If true hash tags will be added to captions.
- `limit`: Number of captions generated. The maximum is 3.
- `vibe`: Define the vibe of the generations.
- `lang`: Multiple languages supported, including English, Spanish, German, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Number of captions returned. Must be <=3.

optional_parameters.name: useHashtags
optional_parameters.description: If true, hashtags will be added to generate captions.

optional_parameters.name: useEmojis
optional_parameters.description: If true, emojis will be added to generate captions.

optional_parameters.name: vibe
optional_parameters.description: Choose the vibe of the generated captions.
